title: Juushin Enbu: Hero Tales (Hero Tales)
synopsis: For citizens of the Ken Empire, justice is a myth. Lord Keiro, the deranged Shogun of the Imperial Army, blazes a trail of terror across the countryside in search of the sacred sword that will make him a god. Standing in his way is Taito, an omnipotent star reborn in human formâ€”a young hero who vows to use his celestial strength to avenge those slaughtered by the villainous Shogun.
